website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok CrossFit Nano 8 Flexweave was generally well-loved by the consumers. It was regarded for its versatility, comfort, and cozy fit. CrossFit aficionados also commended the flexible forefoot and supportive heel.Despite a few minor gripes about the shoe, it generally exceeded users’ expectations as an all-around CrossFit trainer.
pros: A vast majority of users were impressed by the comfortable build of the Reebok CrossFit Nano 8 Flexweave
The flexible forefoot worked well during plyometrics, sprints, and runs, according to droves of reviewers
Various testers were pleased with the lightweight and breathable nature of the merchandise
Plenty of owners claimed that the product was reasonably priced given its quality build and durability
The heel was described as stable by a lot of weightlifters
The upper was deemed supportive during lateral cuts by multiple purchasers
Several wearers enjoyed the roomy forefoot that allowed for toe splaying
A few individuals liked that sockliner was removable because they were able to use custom orthotics instead
The style, diverse colorways, and customization options delighted a myriad of buyers
cons: A lot of naysayers reported that the Reebok CrossFit Nano 8 Flexweave caused heel slippage
A handful of commenters were disappointed that the bumpers did not offer protection during toes-to-bar and burpees

customer_reviews.title: Best Workout Shoes Ever
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Nano guy since the 2.0s. I've owned the 2.0, 3.0, 4.0, 5.0, and 7.0 and honestly none come close to how comfortable and supportive this shoe is. The 2.0's were my favorite until this came along, and it's incredible how well it fits right out of the box. Even though it looks similar to the 7.0 (which are my least favorite), they feel TOTALLY different. I will be ordering a second pair of these soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and comfort straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for about 2 weeks at crossfit and I really like them. They fit me well right out of the box, no rash on the heel or break in required (size 9 M). The toe box is spacious but not loose, I like it. Good for running but I haven't gone more than a mile on them. Coming from a pair of Inov-8 F-lite 250, I'd say these are a better cross training shoe. Overall I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: JFolt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Really love these shoes! I based my sizing off the measurement chart and was happy with the fit. I like the extra room in the toe box and the shoes are very comfy! I’ve used them primarily in CrossFit classes, but also in Powerlifting and just for running. Definitely saw improvement in my squats, and after the first couple of wears, running is comfortable in them too (got a blister the first time I ran in them, but it was also the first day I wore them so they weren’t broken in)
customer_reviews.author: rtigner7189

customer_reviews.title: Patriot runners, Crossfit and overall trainers! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
customer_reviews.text: As I placed these on my feet I heard a American Eagle cal in the distances his approval. The red white and blue in these shoes do not run or fade. However you can run in these, especially towards freedom and patriotism. God bless America and you!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K Lingle

customer_reviews.title: America
customer_reviews.text: I have the 9’s. Seen these and had to order. Love the color scheme
customer_reviews.author: Jdickerson

customer_reviews.title: The white midsole can get dirty pretty easily. They are excellent for working out and doing any type of routine at the gym.
customer_reviews.text: They came in their box, new and original. I was a little bit nervous because I found the price kinda low but they were rhe real deal. I am 9.5M and my feet are wide. These shoes fit really well. They are a little bit stiff and feel narrow the first time I wore them. After the first use they loose and fit perfectly. Can't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Rodriguez Menicucci

customer_reviews.title: very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: i always have nano since nano 2, so theres no much to say, very comfortable, very nice colors, fit as expected, very good for crossfit and any workout
customer_reviews.author: Martin Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly more comfortable than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I've NEVER written a review about any shoes I've ever purchased and worn, but these are EASILY and by far the most comfortable shoes (especially brand new out of the box) I've ever put on!
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Lucas Ford

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe cause the reviews said it was the most comfortable shoe........ I have to agree. I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Domenic Durr

customer_reviews.title: best crossfit shoe for comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite nano and I own a lot. Like this one better than the 7.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Geisen

customer_reviews.title: I love the room in the toebox
customer_reviews.text: I love the room in the toebox. I did have to add Dr. Scholes for added support. I feel the shoes are helping me keep my heels down on heavy lifts.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sowles

customer_reviews.title: The 9’s are better
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe just a little to tight for a nano
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: ... too thin for my feet but they are very comfortable. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was worried they would be too thin for my feet but they are very comfortable. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Reebok Mens - Crossfit Nano 8.0 Flexweave
product_meta.description: Since 2010 Reebok has forged the Nano through sweat testing re-designing and re-testing to create our most versatile and dependable CrossFit shoe in the box. The Nano 8 was developed with insight from the CrossFit community and has been engineered for maximum comfort. The re-engineered Flexweave upper provides breathability stability and durability and the added cushioning in the forefoot help keep you comfortable. The CrossFit-specific outsole gives you grip in the box so you can hit your PRs.
feature_bullets: Synthetic mesh upper for comfort, fit and durability
Molded sockliner for comfort, cushioning and durability
New heel bootie construction provides ultimate performance comfort
Nanoweave engineered upper with new pattern zoned for breathability and durability
